content.body: littledan: another occasion to note that the current "register as a contributor" process is absurd and I think ought to be revised https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/3192#issuecomment-1758898371
content.formatted_body: littledan: another occasion to note that the current "register as a contributor" process is absurd and I think ought to be revised https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/3192#issuecomment-1758898371

content.body: ecma262 editors should have discretion to mark a contribution as not substantial and merge without getting the CLA signed
